Name: Southern Punch
Ingredients: 45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Tropical flavours with the warmth of liquor trailed by a fresh lemon finish.
Nutrition: One serving of Southern Punch contains 279 calories
